verses.verse: ה֗וֹי <WH1945> Woe עֲטֶ֤רֶת <WH5850> to the crown גֵּאוּת֙ <WH1348> of pride שִׁכֹּרֵ֣י <WH7910> to the drunkards אֶפְרַ֔יִם <WH669> of Ephraim וְצִ֥יץ <WH6731> flower נֹבֵ֖ל <WH5034> [is] a fading צְבִ֣י <WH6643> whose glorious תִפְאַרְתּ֑וֹ <WH8597> beauty אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> Which עַל־ <WH5921> is at רֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> which [are] on the head גֵּֽיא־ <WH1516> valleys שְׁמָנִ֖ים <WH8081> of the fat הֲל֥וּמֵי <WH1986> of them that are overcome יָֽיִן׃ <WH3196> with wine

הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold חָזָ֤ק <WH2389> hath a mighty וְאַמִּץ֙ <WH533> and strong one לַֽאדֹנָ֔י <WH136> Behold the Lord כְּזֶ֥רֶם <WH2230> [which] as a tempest בָּרָ֖ד <WH1259> of hail שַׂ֣עַר <WH8178> storm קָ֑טֶב <WH6986> [and] a destroying כְּ֠זֶרֶם <WH2230> as a flood מַ֣יִם <WH4325> waters כַּבִּירִ֥ים <WH3524> of mighty שֹׁטְפִ֛ים <WH7857> overflowing הִנִּ֥יחַ <WH3240> shall cast down לָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> to the earth בְּיָֽד׃ <WH3027> with the hand
בְּרַגְלַ֖יִם <WH7272> under feet תֵּֽרָמַ֑סְנָה <WH7429> shall be trodden עֲטֶ֥רֶת <WH5850> The crown גֵּא֖וּת <WH1348> of pride שִׁכּוֹרֵ֥י <WH7910> the drunkards אֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <WH669> of Ephraim

וְֽהָ֨יְתָ֜ה <WH1961> become צִיצַ֤ת <WH6733> flower נֹבֵל֙ <WH5034> shall be a fading צְבִ֣י <WH6643> And the glorious תִפְאַרְתּ֔וֹ <WH8597> beauty אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> Which עַל־ <WH5921> is at רֹ֖אשׁ <WH7218> which [is] on the head גֵּ֣יא <WH1516> valley שְׁמָנִ֑ים <WH8081> of the fat כְּבִכּוּרָהּ֙ <WH1061> [and] as the hasty fruit בְּטֶ֣רֶם <WH2962> prior קַ֔יִץ <WH7019> before the summer אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> Which יִרְאֶ֤ה <WH7200> which [when] he that looketh הָֽרֹאֶה֙ <WH7200> upon it seeth אוֹתָ֔הּ <WH853> בְּעוֹדָ֥הּ <WH5750> soon בְּכַפּ֖וֹ <WH3709> while it is yet in his hand יִבְלָעֶֽנָּה׃ <WH1104> he eateth it up ס

בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> In that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> he יִֽהְיֶה֙ <WH1961> will become יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> shall the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts לַעֲטֶ֣רֶת <WH5850> be for a crown צְבִ֔י <WH6643> of glory וְלִצְפִירַ֖ת <WH6843> and for a diadem תִּפְאָרָ֑ה <WH8597> of beauty לִשְׁאָ֖ר <WH7605> unto the residue עַמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5971> of his people

וּלְר֖וּחַ <WH7307> And for a spirit מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> of judgment לַיּוֹשֵׁב֙ <WH3427> to him that sitteth עַל־ <WH5921> in הַמִּשְׁפָּ֔ט <WH4941> in judgment וְלִ֨גְבוּרָ֔ה <WH1369> and for strength מְשִׁיבֵ֥י <WH7725> to them that turn מִלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> the battle שָֽׁעְרָה׃ <WH8179> to the gate ס

וְגַם־ <WH1571> also אֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> But they בַּיַּ֣יִן <WH3196> through wine שָׁג֔וּ <WH7686> also have erred וּבַשֵּׁכָ֖ר <WH7941> and through strong drink תָּע֑וּ <WH8582> are out of the way כֹּהֵ֣ן <WH3548> the priest וְנָבִיא֩ <WH5030> and the prophet שָׁג֨וּ <WH7686> have erred בַשֵּׁכָ֜ר <WH7941> through strong drink נִבְלְע֣וּ <WH1104> they are swallowed up מִן־ <WH4480> of הַיַּ֗יִן <WH3196> wine תָּעוּ֙ <WH8582> they are out of the way מִן־ <WH4480> with הַשֵּׁכָ֔ר <WH7941> through strong drink שָׁגוּ֙ <WH7686> they err בָּֽרֹאֶ֔ה <WH7203> in vision פָּק֖וּ <WH6328> they stumble פְּלִילִיָּֽה׃ <WH6417> [in] judgment

כִּ֚י <WH3588> for כָּל־ <WH3605> for all שֻׁלְחָנ֔וֹת <WH7979> For all tables מָלְא֖וּ <WH4390> are full קִ֣יא <WH6892> of vomit צֹאָ֑ה <WH6675> [and] filthiness בְּלִ֖י <WH1097> without מָקֽוֹם׃ <WH4725> [so that there is] no place ס

אֶת־ <WH853> מִי֙ <WH4310> to whom יוֹרֶ֣ה <WH3384> Whom shall he teach דֵעָ֔ה <WH1844> knowledge וְאֶת־ <WH853> מִ֖י <WH4310> whom יָבִ֣ין <WH995> interpret שְׁמוּעָ֑ה <WH8052> bruit גְּמוּלֵי֙ <WH1580> from מֵֽחָלָ֔ב <WH2461> from the milk עַתִּיקֵ֖י <WH6267> [and] drawn מִשָּׁדָֽיִם׃ <WH7699> from the breasts

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For צַ֤ו <WH6673> For precept לָצָו֙ <WH6673> [must be] upon precept צַ֣ו <WH6673> precept לָצָ֔ו <WH6673> upon precept קַ֥ו <WH6957> line לָקָ֖ו <WH6957> upon line קַ֣ו <WH6957> line לָקָ֑ו <WH6957> upon line זְעֵ֥יר <WH2191> here a little שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> here זְעֵ֥יר <WH2191> [and] there a little שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> here

כִּ֚י <WH3588> Indeed בְּלַעֲגֵ֣י <WH3934> For with stammering שָׂפָ֔ה <WH8193> lips וּבְלָשׁ֖וֹן <WH3956> tongue אַחֶ֑רֶת <WH312> and another יְדַבֵּ֖ר <WH1696> will he speak אֶל־ <WH413> about הָעָ֥ם <WH5971> to this people הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this

אֲשֶׁ֣ר ׀ <WH834> who אָמַ֣ר <WH559> To whom he said אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH413> about זֹ֤את <WH2063> likewise הַמְּנוּחָה֙ <WH4496> This [is] the rest הָנִ֣יחוּ <WH5117> to rest לֶֽעָיֵ֔ף <WH5889> [wherewith] ye may cause the weary וְזֹ֖את <WH2063> likewise הַמַּרְגֵּעָ֑ה <WH4774> and this [is] the refreshing וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not אָב֖וּא <WH14> yet they would שְׁמֽוֹעַ׃ <WH8085> not hear

וְהָיָ֨ה <WH1961> become לָהֶ֜ם <WH1992> like דְּבַר־ <WH1697> But the word יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD צַ֣ו <WH6673> was unto them precept לָצָ֞ו <WH6673> upon precept צַ֤ו <WH6673> precept לָצָו֙ <WH6673> upon precept קַ֤ו <WH6957> line לָקָו֙ <WH6957> upon line קַ֣ו <WH6957> line לָקָ֔ו <WH6957> upon line זְעֵ֥יר <WH2191> here a little שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> here זְעֵ֣יר <WH2191> [and] there a little שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> there לְמַ֨עַן <WH4616> because of יֵלְכ֜וּ <WH1980> may go וְכָשְׁל֤וּ <WH3782> and fall אָחוֹר֙ <WH268> backward וְנִשְׁבָּ֔רוּ <WH7665> and be broken וְנוֹקְשׁ֖וּ <WH3369> and snared וְנִלְכָּֽדוּ׃ <WH3920> and taken פ

לָכֵ֛ן <WH3651> Therefore שִׁמְע֥וּ <WH8085> Wherefore hear דְבַר־ <WH1697> the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> you לָצ֑וֹן <WH3944> ye scornful מֹֽשְׁלֵי֙ <WH4910> that rule הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> this people הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> who בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> which [is] in Jerusalem

כִּ֣י <WH3588> Because אֲמַרְתֶּ֗ם <WH559> Because ye have said כָּרַ֤תְנֽוּ <WH3772> We have made בְרִית֙ <WH1285> a covenant אֶת־ <WH854> with מָ֔וֶת <WH4194> with death וְעִם־ <WH5973> and with שְׁא֖וֹל <WH7585> and with hell עָשִׂ֣ינוּ <WH6213> are we חֹזֶ֑ה <WH2374> at agreement [שִׁיט כ] (שֹׁ֣וט <WH7885> oar ק) שׁוֹטֵ֤ף <WH7752> scourge כִּֽי־ <WH3588> when [עָבַר כ] (יַֽעֲבֹר֙ <WH5674> alienate ק) לֹ֣א <WH3808> will not יְבוֹאֵ֔נוּ <WH935> it shall not come כִּ֣י <WH3588> when שַׂ֧מְנוּ <WH7760> unto us for we have made כָזָ֛ב <WH3577> lies מַחְסֵ֖נוּ <WH4268> our refuge וּבַשֶּׁ֥קֶר <WH8267> and under falsehood נִסְתָּֽרְנוּ׃ <WH5641> have we hid ס

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD הִנְנִ֛י <WH2005> behold יִסַּ֥ד <WH3245> Behold I lay בְּצִיּ֖וֹן <WH6726> in Zion אָ֑בֶן <WH68> for a foundation a stone אֶ֣בֶן <WH68> stone בֹּ֜חַן <WH976> a tried פִּנַּ֤ת <WH6438> corner יִקְרַת֙ <WH3368> a precious מוּסָ֣ד <WH4143> foundation מוּסָּ֔ד <WH3245> [stone] a sure הַֽמַּאֲמִ֖ין <WH539> he that believeth לֹ֥א <WH3808> before יָחִֽישׁ׃ <WH2363> shall not make haste

וְשַׂמְתִּ֤י <WH7760> also will I lay מִשְׁפָּט֙ <WH4941> Judgment לְקָ֔ו <WH6957> to the line וּצְדָקָ֖ה <WH6666> and righteousness לְמִשְׁקָ֑לֶת <WH4949> to the plummet וְיָעָ֤ה <WH3261> shall sweep away בָרָד֙ <WH1259> and the hail מַחְסֵ֣ה <WH4268> the refuge כָזָ֔ב <WH3577> of lies וְסֵ֥תֶר <WH5643> the hiding place מַ֖יִם <WH4325> and the waters יִשְׁטֹֽפוּ׃ <WH7857> shall overflow

וְכֻפַּ֤ר <WH3722> shall be disannulled בְּרִֽיתְכֶם֙ <WH1285> And your covenant אֶת־ <WH854> with מָ֔וֶת <WH4194> with death וְחָזוּתְכֶ֥ם <WH2380> and your agreement אֶת־ <WH854> with שְׁא֖וֹל <WH7585> with hell לֹ֣א <WH3808> will not תָק֑וּם <WH6965> shall not stand שׁ֤וֹט <WH7752> scourge שׁוֹטֵף֙ <WH7857> when the overflowing כִּ֣י <WH3588> When יַֽעֲבֹ֔ר <WH5674> shall pass through וִהְיִ֥יתֶם <WH1961> become ל֖וֹ לְמִרְמָֽס׃ <WH4823> then ye shall be trodden down

מִדֵּ֤י <WH1767> From the time עָבְרוֹ֙ <WH5674> that it goeth forth יִקַּ֣ח <WH3947> it shall take אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For בַבֹּ֧קֶר <WH1242> you for morning בַּבֹּ֛קֶר <WH1242> by morning יַעֲבֹ֖ר <WH5674> shall it pass over בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> by day וּבַלָּ֑יְלָה <WH3915> and by night וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become רַק־ <WH7535> but זְוָעָ֖ה <WH2113> and it shall be a vexation הָבִ֥ין <WH995> only [to] understand שְׁמוּעָֽה׃ <WH8052> the report

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for קָצַ֥ר <WH7114> is shorter הַמַּצָּ֖ע <WH4702> For the bed מֵֽהִשְׂתָּרֵ֑עַ <WH8311> than that [a man] can stretch וְהַמַּסֵּכָ֥ה <WH4541> himself [on it] and the covering צָ֖רָה <WH6887> narrower כְּהִתְכַּנֵּֽס׃ <WH3664> than that he can wrap

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for כְהַר־ <WH2022> as [in] mount פְּרָצִים֙ <WH6559> Perazim יָק֣וּם <WH6965> shall rise up יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> For the LORD כְּעֵ֖מֶק <WH6010> as [in] the valley בְּגִבְע֣וֹן <WH1391> of Gibeon יִרְגָּ֑ז <WH7264> he shall be wroth לַעֲשׂ֤וֹת <WH6213> that he may do מַעֲשֵׂ֙הוּ֙ <WH4639> his work זָ֣ר <WH2114> his strange מַעֲשֵׂ֔הוּ <WH4639> work וְלַֽעֲבֹד֙ <WH5647> and bring to pass עֲבֹ֣דָת֔וֹ <WH5656> his act נָכְרִיָּ֖ה <WH5237> his strange עֲבֹדָתֽוֹ׃ <WH5656> act

וְעַתָּה֙ <WH6258> and now אַל־ <WH408> nay תִּתְלוֹצָ֔צוּ <WH3887> Now therefore be ye not mockers פֶּֽן־ <WH6435> Or יֶחְזְק֖וּ <WH2388> be made strong מֽוֹסְרֵיכֶ֑ם <WH4147> lest your bands כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for כָלָ֨ה <WH3617> a consumption וְנֶחֱרָצָ֜ה <WH2782> even determined שָׁמַ֗עְתִּי <WH8085> for I have heard מֵאֵ֨ת <WH853> אֲדֹנָ֧י <WH136> from the Lord יְהוִ֛ה <WH3068> GOD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts עַל־ <WH5921> on כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> upon the whole earth
הַאֲזִ֥ינוּ <WH238> Give ye ear וְשִׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> and hear קוֹלִ֑י <WH6963> my voice הַקְשִׁ֥יבוּ <WH7181> hearken וְשִׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> and hear אִמְרָתִֽי׃ <WH565> my speech

הֲכֹ֣ל <WH3605> all הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> all day יַחֲרֹ֥שׁ <WH2790> Doth the plowman הַחֹרֵ֖שׁ <WH2790> plow לִזְרֹ֑עַ <WH2232> to sow יְפַתַּ֥ח <WH6605> ? doth he open וִֽישַׂדֵּ֖ד <WH7702> and break the clods אַדְמָתֽוֹ׃ <WH127> land

הֲלוֹא֙ <WH3808> not אִם־ <WH518> not שִׁוָּ֣ה <WH7737> When he hath made plain פָנֶ֔יהָ <WH6440> the face וְהֵפִ֥יץ <WH6327> thereof doth he not cast abroad קֶ֖צַח <WH7100> the fitches וְכַמֹּ֣ן <WH3646> the cummin יִזְרֹ֑ק <WH2236> and scatter וְשָׂ֨ם <WH7760> and cast חִטָּ֤ה <WH2406> wheat שׂוֹרָה֙ <WH7795> in the principal וּשְׂעֹרָ֣ה <WH8184> barley נִסְמָ֔ן <WH5567> and the appointed וְכֻסֶּ֖מֶת <WH3698> and the rie גְּבֻלָתֽוֹ׃ <WH1367> border
וְיִסְּר֥וֹ <WH3256> doth instruct לַמִּשְׁפָּ֖ט <WH4941> him to discretion אֱלֹהָ֥יו <WH430> For his God יוֹרֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH3384> [and] doth teach

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹ֤א <WH3808> Nor בֶֽחָרוּץ֙ <WH2742> with a threshing instrument י֣וּדַשׁ <WH1758> are not threshed קֶ֔צַח <WH7100> For the fitches וְאוֹפַ֣ן <WH212> wheel עֲגָלָ֔ה <WH5699> neither is a cart עַל־ <WH5921> over כַּמֹּ֖ן <WH3646> upon the cummin יוּסָּ֑ב <WH5437> turned about כִּ֧י <WH3588> with בַמַּטֶּ֛ה <WH4294> with a staff יֵחָ֥בֶט <WH2251> are beaten out קֶ֖צַח <WH7100> but the fitches וְכַמֹּ֥ן <WH3646> and the cummin בַּשָּֽׁבֶט׃ <WH7626> with a rod

לֶ֣חֶם <WH3899> Bread יוּדָ֔ק <WH1854> [corn] is bruised כִּ֛י <WH3588> Indeed לֹ֥א <WH3808> not לָנֶ֖צַח <WH5331> because he will not ever אָד֣וֹשׁ <WH156> the mantle יְדוּשֶׁ֑נּוּ <WH1758> continue וְ֠הָמַם <WH2000> it nor break גִּלְגַּ֧ל <WH1536> [it with] the wheel עֶגְלָת֛וֹ <WH5699> of his cart וּפָרָשָׁ֖יו <WH6571> it [with] his horsemen לֹֽא־ <WH3808> does not יְדֻקֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH1854> nor bruise

גַּם־ <WH1571> also זֹ֕את <WH2063> likewise מֵעִ֛ם <WH5973> from יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> from the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts יָצָ֑אָה <WH3318> This also cometh forth הִפְלִ֣יא <WH6381> [which] is wonderful עֵצָ֔ה <WH6098> in counsel הִגְדִּ֖יל <WH1431> [and] excellent תּוּשִׁיָּֽה׃ <WH8454> in working ס
